statements: SELECT * FROM team_progress_reports;
SELECT team_member_name, tasks_completed, productivity_rating FROM team_progress_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT report_id, team_member_name, tasks_completed FROM team_progress_reports WHERE tasks_pending > 0;
SELECT report_date, team_member_name FROM team_progress_reports WHERE productivity_rating >= 8.0;
SELECT team_member_name, tasks_completed + tasks_pending AS total_tasks FROM team_progress_reports ORDER BY total_tasks DESC;
SELECT * FROM team_progress_reports WHERE tasks_completed > 5 ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT team_member_name, tasks_completed, productivity_rating FROM team_progress_reports WHERE tasks_pending < 3;
SELECT report_id, team_member_name, productivity_rating FROM team_progress_reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM team_progress_reports WHERE productivity_rating > 4.0 ORDER BY team_member_name ASC, report_date DESC;
SELECT team_member_name, SUM(tasks_completed) AS total_completed_tasks FROM team_progress_reports GROUP BY team_member_name HAVING total_completed_tasks > 10;
SELECT id, name, role FROM team_members WHERE role = 'Developer';
SELECT * FROM team_members ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT task_name, status, deadline FROM team_tasks WHERE status = 'In Progress';
SELECT id, role, location FROM team_members WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY role ASC;
SELECT task_name, assigned_to FROM team_tasks WHERE deadline > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY assigned_to;
SELECT * FROM team_members WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT name, role FROM team_members WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM team_members;
SELECT task_name, status FROM team_tasks WHERE assigned_to = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001' AND status = 'In Progress';
SELECT * FROM team_tasks WHERE deadline > '2023-01-01' ORDER BY deadline DESC;
SELECT * FROM team_members;
SELECT member_name, role FROM team_members WHERE department='Engineering';
SELECT task_description, hours_worked FROM work_logs WHERE log_date='2022-01-20';
SELECT task_description, status FROM task_progress ORDER BY deadline DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT department FROM team_members;
SELECT * FROM team_members;
SELECT member_name, role FROM team_members WHERE department='Engineering';
SELECT log_date, hours_worked FROM work_logs ORDER BY log_date DESC;
SELECT task_description, status FROM task_progress WHERE deadline > '2022-01-01';
SELECT member_name, role, department FROM team_members JOIN task_progress ON team_members.member_id = task_progress.assigned_to ORDER BY department, member_name;
SELECT * FROM team_members;
SELECT name, email FROM team_members WHERE role = 'Engineer';
SELECT task_name, status FROM team_tasks WHERE due_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT percentage_complete, comments FROM task_progress WHERE assignee_id = 1 ORDER BY percentage_complete DESC;
SELECT report_name, generated_by, generated_on FROM team_reports WHERE generated_on BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM team_members ORDER BY name DESC, id ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT task_name, due_date, status FROM team_tasks WHERE status = 'In Progress' ORDER BY due_date ASC LIMIT 5

SELECT team_members.name, team_tasks.task_name, task_progress.percentage_complete FROM team_members JOIN team_tasks ON team_members.id = team_tasks.assignee_id JOIN task_progress ON team_tasks.task_id = task_progress.task_id WHERE task_progress.percentage_complete > 50 ORDER BY task_progress.percentage_complete DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT team_reports.report_name, team_reports.generated_by, team_members.name AS generated_by_name, team_tasks.task_name AS latest_task_assigned FROM team_reports JOIN team_members ON team_reports.generated_by = team_members.id JOIN team_tasks ON team_members.id = team_tasks.assignee_id WHERE team_tasks.status = 'Pending' ORDER BY team_reports.generated_on DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT task_name, SUM(percentage_complete) AS total_progress FROM team_tasks JOIN task_progress ON team_tasks.task_id = task_progress.task_id GROUP BY task_name HAVING total_progress > 100 ORDER BY total_progress DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM team_members ORDER BY joined_date ASC;
SELECT name, department FROM team_members WHERE position = 'Developer';
SELECT task_name, priority, deadline FROM tasks WHERE deadline > '2022-01-01';
SELECT member_id, task_id, progress_percentage FROM task_progress WHERE progress_percentage > 50;
SELECT member_id, AVG(performance_rating) AS avg_rating FROM team_performance GROUP BY member_id;
SELECT * FROM team_members WHERE department = 'Engineering';
SELECT name, position FROM team_members ORDER BY joined_date DESC;
SELECT task_name, deadline FROM tasks WHERE priority = 'High' ORDER BY deadline ASC;
SELECT member_id, progress_percentage FROM task_progress WHERE progress_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT report_text FROM weekly_reports WHERE year = 2022 AND week_number = 15;
